inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().add('DualWieldTraining'); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('DualWieldAttack', 25); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('OffHandAttack', 10); effect.getBonuses().addBonus('DualWieldStrDamage', 3); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Ambidextrous
description: Ambidextrous creatures can use either hand nearly as easily as the other for any task.  They can use a weapon in their off hand with nearly no penalties.
